contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox park | name = Harborne Reserve | photo = | photo_width = | photo_caption = | type = | location = [[Harborne]], [[Birmingham]], [[England]] | coords = {{coord|52.466|-1.951|region:GB-BIR_type:landmark|display=inline,title}} | area = | created = | operator = [[West Midland Bird Club]] | visitation_num = | status = | website = {{URL |westmidlandbirdclub.com/harborne}} }} '''Harborne Reserve''' ({{gbmapping|SP034851}}) is a nature reserve in [[Harborne]], [[Birmingham]], [[England]], operated by the [[West Midland Bird Club]]. Entry is by permit only, except on advertised open days. The reserve comprises two parts which total {{convert|9|acre|m2}} of disused [[allotment (gardening)|allotments]], leased from [[Birmingham City Council]]. It is located approximately three miles from Birmingham city centre, alongside the [[Harborne Branch Line#Demise|Harborne Walkway]]. == External links == * [http://www.westmidlandbirdclub.com/harborne Harborne Nature Reserve] [[Category:Nature reserves in Birmingham, West Midlands]] {{Birmingham parks}} {{WestMidlands-geo-stub}}
